content: संयुज् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To join together, connect, unite. {@--2@} To endow or furnish with. {@--3@} To form an alliance. {@--4@} To place or fix in, set in. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} To be united with; संयोक्ष्यसे स्वेन वर्पुमहिम्ना <ls>R. 5. 55.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To unite, join; संयोजयति विद्यैव नीचगापि नरंसरित् <ls>H. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To harness, yoke. {@--3@} To prepare, equip (an army). {@--4@} To furnish, endow or supply with, provide with; बुद्ध्या संयो जयंति तं <ls>Pt. 2.</ls> {@--5@} To fasten or fix on. {@--6@} To throw, discharge, shoot (a missile). {@--7@} To use, employ. {@--8@} To appoint (to an office), entrust with. {@--9@} To perform, accomplish. --To be absorbed in, meditate upon.
संयुज् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Connected, relating to; <ls>Śi. 14. 55.</ls> {@--2@} Possessed of or endowed with good qualities.
